I can't vouch for this utility but it claims to be able to convert to MP3 for you... http://www.maniactools.com/soft/m4a-to-mp3-converter/

M4A = audio only with alleged improved compression and fidelity beyond MP3

M4B = adds bookmarking

... itunes will convert files to mp3 for you as well if you already use it :-)
